<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (and (shl x, c2), c1) will be matched to (srli (slli x, c2+c3), c3) if c1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is a mask shifted by c2 bits with c3 leading zeros.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a582e08755c7a8d1b0bf6c5dcb765aaa8">isShiftedMask&#95;64</a>(Mask)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Trailing = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(Mask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShAmt == Trailing)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#ac44f6b9fdbb5f9cc199f8329cb0b272ca89f768b1267e3083b4eb05b4ab77e717">TTI::TCC&#95;Free</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Instruction::Store: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the materialization cost regardless of if it&#39;s the address or the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value that is constant, except for if the store is misaligned and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, use the full materialisation cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#af33d60647545abc34d1e448b2b49bc58">getIntImmCost</a>(Imm, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vmv.s.x      v0, a0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vmerge.vvm   v8, v9, v8, v0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We use 2 for the cost of the mask materialization as this is the true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cost for small masks and most shuffles are small.  At worst, this cost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// should be a very small constant for the constant pool load.  As such,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we may bias towards large selects slightly more than truely warranted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LT.first &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">           (1 + getRISCVInstructionCost(&#123;RISCV::VMV&#95;S&#95;X, RISCV::VMERGE&#95;VVM&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecab1ac8982cdb119f39a5fe74610a46796">TTI::SK&#95;Broadcast</a>: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasScalar = (Args.size() &gt; 0) &amp;&amp; (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/operator/#aca4ffddc11c10477a4a76ada6fd5da46">Operator::getOpcode</a>(Args&#91;0&#93;) ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           Instruction::InsertElement);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.second.getScalarSizeInBits() == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (HasScalar) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example sequence:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   andi a0, a0, 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vsetivli zero, 2, e8, mf8, ta, ma (ignored)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmv.v.x v8, a0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmsne.vi v0, v8, 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LT.first &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">               (1 + getRISCVInstructionCost(&#123;RISCV::VMV&#95;V&#95;X, RISCV::VMSNE&#95;VI&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example sequence:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vsetivli  zero, 2, e8, mf8, ta, mu (ignored)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmv.v.i v8, 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmerge.vim      v8, v8, 1, v0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmv.x.s a0, v8</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   andi    a0, a0, 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmv.v.x v8, a0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmsne.vi  v0, v8, 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LT.first &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">             (1 + getRISCVInstructionCost(&#123;RISCV::VMV&#95;V&#95;I, RISCV::VMERGE&#95;VIM,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           RISCV::VMV&#95;X&#95;S, RISCV::VMV&#95;V&#95;X,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           RISCV::VMSNE&#95;VI&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (HasScalar) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example sequence:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmv.v.x v8, a0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LT.first &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">             getRISCVInstructionCost(RISCV::VMV&#95;V&#95;X, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example sequence:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vrgather.vi     v9, v8, 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecaa9e18b2636661e341804da24971997df">TTI::SK&#95;Splice</a>: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vslidedown+vslideup.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Multiplying by LT.first implies this legalizes into multiple copies</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcodes&#91;2&#93; = &#123;RISCV::VSLIDEDOWN&#95;VX, RISCV::VSLIDEUP&#95;VX&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53ecaea788d98147161f25d5adc3ec6ce7e1f">TTI::SK&#95;Reverse</a>: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Cases to improve here:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; Illegal vector types</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; i64 on RV32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; i1 vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At low LMUL, most of the cost is producing the vrgather index register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At high LMUL, the cost of the vrgather itself will dominate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example sequence:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   csrr a0, vlenb</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   srli a0, a0, 3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   addi a0, a0, -1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vsetvli a1, zero, e8, mf8, ta, mu (ignored)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vid.v v9</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vrsub.vx v10, v9, a0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vrgather.vv v9, v8, v10</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> LenCost = 3;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.second.isFixedLengthVector())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vrsub.vi has a 5 bit immediate field, otherwise an li suffices</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">      LenCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;5&gt;</a>(LT.second.getVectorNumElements() - 1) ? 0 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcodes&#91;&#93; = &#123;RISCV::VID&#95;V, RISCV::VRSUB&#95;VX, RISCV::VRGATHER&#95;VV&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.second.isFixedLengthVector() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;5&gt;</a>(LT.second.getVectorNumElements() - 1))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">      Opcodes&#91;1&#93; = RISCV::VRSUB&#95;VI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> GatherCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">        getRISCVInstructionCost(Opcodes, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask operation additionally required extend and truncate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ExtendCost = Tp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype/#afdce715c901d62e2c1367a0ff5248175">getElementType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ac6d28a9b11139182134a9618028a0d07">isIntegerTy</a>(1) ? 3 : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LT.first &#42; (LenCost + GatherCost + ExtendCost);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a60269460307676b0f5be6e2e22044529">BaseT::getShuffleCost</a>(Kind, Tp, Mask, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, SubTp);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A build&#95;vector (which is m1 sized or smaller) can be done in no</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in theory do an explode&#95;vector in the inverse manner, but our</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lowering today does not have a first class node for this pattern.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ad46cd19003cfbd8c6436b8c92172efa8">BaseT::getScalarizationOverhead</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal">      Ty, DemandedElts, Insert, Extract, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Ty);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The interleaved memory access pass will lower interleaved memory ops (i.e</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!UseMaskForCond &amp;&amp; !UseMaskForGaps &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(VTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.second.isVector()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SubVecTy =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Mask = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a689f785bfa4f3650dc44d519df0406fd">createStrideMask</a>(Index, Factor, VF);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &#123;&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> += ShuffleCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Model for NF &gt; 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We&#39;ll need to enhance getShuffleCost to model shuffles that are just</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inserts and extracts into subvectors, since they won&#39;t have the full cost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of a vrgather.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An interleaved store for 3 vectors of 4 lanes will look like</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %11 = shufflevector &lt;4 x i32&gt; %4, &lt;4 x i32&gt; %6, &lt;8 x i32&gt; &lt;0...7&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %12 = shufflevector &lt;4 x i32&gt; %9, &lt;4 x i32&gt; poison, &lt;8 x i32&gt; &lt;0...3&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %13 = shufflevector &lt;8 x i32&gt; %11, &lt;8 x i32&gt; %12, &lt;12 x i32&gt; &lt;0...11&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// %interleaved.vec = shufflevector %13, poison, &lt;12 x i32&gt; &lt;interleave mask&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// store &lt;12 x i32&gt; %interleaved.vec, ptr %10, align 4</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Factor != 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a09ac3c26a04fdf36e4bcc0e725fca41e">BaseT::getInterleavedMemoryOpCost</a>(Opcode, VecTy, Factor, Indices,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dc">AddressSpace</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             UseMaskForCond, UseMaskForGaps);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Opcode == Instruction::Store &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Opcode must be a store&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For an interleaving store of 2 vectors, we perform one large interleaving</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shuffle that goes into the wide store</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Mask = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aab4ac3afe77847f88a5bec4ef29e68fa">createInterleaveMask</a>(VF, Factor);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ShuffleCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a1e2ab02b19200a9749a3a7f67d7e7cdb">getShuffleCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af46433d0e36d3f80afc3a8c67b5c53eca7beec9815d0197f2d31fac9968e9205b">TTI::ShuffleKind::SK&#95;PermuteSingleSrc</a>, FVTy, Mask,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal">                     <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &#123;&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MemCost + ShuffleCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Intrinsic::smax:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1532"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VMAX&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VREDMAX&#95;VS, RISCV::VMV&#95;X&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1534"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1535"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Intrinsic::smin:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1536"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VMIN&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1537"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VREDMIN&#95;VS, RISCV::VMV&#95;X&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1538"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1539"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Intrinsic::umax:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1540"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VMAXU&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1541"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VREDMAXU&#95;VS, RISCV::VMV&#95;X&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1542"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Intrinsic::umin:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VMINU&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VREDMINU&#95;VS, RISCV::VMV&#95;X&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1546"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1547"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Intrinsic::maxnum:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VFMAX&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VFREDMAX&#95;VS, RISCV::VFMV&#95;F&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Intrinsic::minnum:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VFMIN&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VFREDMIN&#95;VS, RISCV::VFMV&#95;F&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add a cost for data larger than LMUL8</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> SplitCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><Highlight kind="normal">      (LT.first &gt; 1) ? (LT.first - 1) &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><Highlight kind="normal">                           getRISCVInstructionCost(SplitOp, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><Highlight kind="normal">                     : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SplitCost + getRISCVInstructionCost(Opcodes, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a1ffc644bb4865116b0a2f4db014e9bed"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a1ffc644bb4865116b0a2f4db014e9bed">RISCVTTIImpl::getArithmeticReductionCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;Ty,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         std::optional&lt;FastMathFlags&gt; FMF,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Ty) &amp;&amp; !ST-&gt;useRVVForFixedLengthVectors())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid opcode&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a32ec12017722f5b42a295fe5eb0b0bdf">ISD::FADD</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Ty);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ElementTy = Ty-&gt;getElementType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ElementTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ac6d28a9b11139182134a9618028a0d07">isIntegerTy</a>(1)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example sequences:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vfirst.m a0, v0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   seqz a0, a0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.second == MVT::v1i1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> getRISCVInstructionCost(RISCV::VFIRST&#95;M, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a1baed59fc0a242d63e6eac45f50f37dd">getCmpSelInstrCost</a>(Instruction::ICmp, ElementTy, ElementTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><Highlight kind="normal">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78baa719225e2de4059f93fd3209e1f48218">CmpInst::ICMP&#95;EQ</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ac513a7da1bf74fb3e3c594da8534f2d2">ISD::AND</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example sequences:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmand.mm v8, v9, v8 ; needed every time type is split</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmnot.m v8, v0      ; alias for vmnand</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vcpop.m a0, v8</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   seqz a0, a0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See the discussion: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/pull/119160</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For LMUL &lt;= 8, there is no splitting,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   the sequences are vmnot, vcpop and seqz.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When LMUL &gt; 8 and split = 1,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   the sequences are vmnand, vcpop and seqz.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When LMUL &gt; 8 and split &gt; 1,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   the sequences are (LT.first-2) &#42; vmand, vmnand, vcpop and seqz.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((LT.first &gt; 2) ? (LT.first - 2) : 0) &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><Highlight kind="normal">                 getRISCVInstructionCost(RISCV::VMAND&#95;MM, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><Highlight kind="normal">             getRISCVInstructionCost(RISCV::VMNAND&#95;MM, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><Highlight kind="normal">             getRISCVInstructionCost(RISCV::VCPOP&#95;M, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a1baed59fc0a242d63e6eac45f50f37dd">getCmpSelInstrCost</a>(Instruction::ICmp, ElementTy, ElementTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><Highlight kind="normal">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78baa719225e2de4059f93fd3209e1f48218">CmpInst::ICMP&#95;EQ</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a92febb83e6ba116eb7aae8e7e3f70cc1">ISD::XOR</a> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example sequences:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vsetvli a0, zero, e8, mf8, ta, ma</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmxor.mm v8, v0, v8 ; needed every time type is split</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example sequences:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vsetvli a0, zero, e8, mf8, ta, ma</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   vmor.mm v8, v9, v8 ; needed every time type is split</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.first - 1) &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><Highlight kind="normal">                 getRISCVInstructionCost(RISCV::VMOR&#95;MM, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><Highlight kind="normal">             getRISCVInstructionCost(RISCV::VCPOP&#95;M, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a1baed59fc0a242d63e6eac45f50f37dd">getCmpSelInstrCost</a>(Instruction::ICmp, ElementTy, ElementTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><Highlight kind="normal">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78bac17897ebf2f6a6986280fc3bdf28a30a">CmpInst::ICMP&#95;NE</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IR Reduction of or/and is composed by one vmv and one rvv reduction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction, and others is composed by two vmv and one rvv reduction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SplitOp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 3&gt;</a> Opcodes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd">ISD</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VADD&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VMV&#95;S&#95;X, RISCV::VREDSUM&#95;VS, RISCV::VMV&#95;X&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a7415ab9f2172c59a2ee7c7a02afa56a4">ISD::OR</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VOR&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VREDOR&#95;VS, RISCV::VMV&#95;X&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a92febb83e6ba116eb7aae8e7e3f70cc1">ISD::XOR</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VXOR&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VMV&#95;S&#95;X, RISCV::VREDXOR&#95;VS, RISCV::VMV&#95;X&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can&#39;t promote f16/bf16 fadd reductions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((LT.second.getScalarType() == MVT::f16 &amp;&amp; !ST-&gt;hasVInstructionsF16()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aacaa7d017eb34bf5050b2fb7f6dd91c4">BaseT::getArithmeticReductionCost</a>(Opcode, Ty, FMF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a7aecc3cf03beff532c2b8bfe81e500c8">TTI::requiresOrderedReduction</a>(FMF)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><Highlight kind="normal">      Opcodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(RISCV::VFMV&#95;S&#95;F);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; LT.first.getValue(); i++)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitOp = RISCV::VFADD&#95;VV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><Highlight kind="normal">    Opcodes = &#123;RISCV::VFMV&#95;S&#95;F, RISCV::VFREDUSUM&#95;VS, RISCV::VFMV&#95;F&#95;S&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> SplitCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><Highlight kind="normal">      (LT.first &gt; 1) ? (LT.first - 1) &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><Highlight kind="normal">                     : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a05cf907fc03e5b3f599a3dbd02c55803"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a05cf907fc03e5b3f599a3dbd02c55803">RISCVTTIImpl::getVectorInstrCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Val,</Highlight></CodeLine>
