<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Op1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;This must be a vector type&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode != Instruction::ExtractElement &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><Highlight kind="normal">      Opcode != Instruction::InsertElement)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#a27bfcb3dd99fa7a7ca8dc24eeac6e8e6">BaseT::getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Val, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, Op0, Op1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Legalize the type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;InstructionCost, MVT&gt; LT = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ab192bc3b4b8ccaa71341acf20e6ac335">getTypeLegalizationCost</a>(Val);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This type is legalized to a scalar type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LT.second.isVector()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;FixedVecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Val);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Index is a known constant, cost is zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index != -1U)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extract/InsertElement with non-constant index is very costly when</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scalarized; estimate cost of loads/stores sequence via the stack:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ExtractElement cost: store vector to stack, load scalar;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// InsertElement cost: store vector to stack, store scalar, load vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ElemTy = FixedVecTy-&gt;getElementType();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElems = FixedVecTy-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>.getPrefTypeAlign(ElemTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> LoadCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#ad360c3b9cdfb92ab7dbbcb9552d786af">getMemoryOpCost</a>(Instruction::Load, ElemTy, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> StoreCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#ad360c3b9cdfb92ab7dbbcb9552d786af">getMemoryOpCost</a>(Instruction::Store, ElemTy, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>, 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode == Instruction::ExtractElement</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><Highlight kind="normal">               ? StoreCost &#42; NumElems + LoadCost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><Highlight kind="normal">               : (StoreCost + LoadCost) &#42; NumElems + StoreCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For unsupported scalable vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.second.isScalableVector() &amp;&amp; !LT.first.isValid())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LT.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask vector extract/insert is expanded via e8.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a9f382207d841377156d4c7868b66b9a5">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;WideTy =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype/#a861be1e2092622462053c6d31dddbfd5">VectorType::get</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype/#a14f7b4f1aed38192fb6b7772eb506bdb">IntegerType::get</a>(Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a909eca4ba9e5eefc203c8e3770bdab25">getContext</a>(), 8),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><Highlight kind="normal">                      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(Val)-&gt;getElementCount());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::ExtractElement) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ExtendCost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><Highlight kind="normal">        = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a6212e41633990ea795daea7917312bdf">getCastInstrCost</a>(Instruction::ZExt, WideTy, Val,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><Highlight kind="normal">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af84cce349a77262269fd3f6756f37a64a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754">TTI::CastContextHint::None</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ExtractCost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><Highlight kind="normal">        = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a05cf907fc03e5b3f599a3dbd02c55803">getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, WideTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExtendCost + ExtractCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> ExtendCost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><Highlight kind="normal">      = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a6212e41633990ea795daea7917312bdf">getCastInstrCost</a>(Instruction::ZExt, WideTy, Val,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af84cce349a77262269fd3f6756f37a64a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754">TTI::CastContextHint::None</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> InsertCost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><Highlight kind="normal">      = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a05cf907fc03e5b3f599a3dbd02c55803">getVectorInstrCost</a>(Opcode, WideTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Index, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> TruncCost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><Highlight kind="normal">      = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a6212e41633990ea795daea7917312bdf">getCastInstrCost</a>(Instruction::Trunc, Val, WideTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#af84cce349a77262269fd3f6756f37a64a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754">TTI::CastContextHint::None</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExtendCost + InsertCost + TruncCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In RVV, we could use vslidedown + vmv.x.s to extract element from vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and vslideup + vmv.s.x to insert element to vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BaseCost = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When insertelement we should add the index with 1 as the input of vslideup.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SlideCost = Opcode == Instruction::InsertElement ? 2 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index != -1U) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The type may be split. For fixed-width vectors we can normalize the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// index to the new type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.second.isFixedLengthVector()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Width = LT.second.getVectorNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><Highlight kind="normal">      Index = Index % Width;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2029"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2030"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If exact VLEN is known, we will insert/extract into the appropriate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2031"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// subvector with no additional subvector insert/extract cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VLEN = ST-&gt;getRealVLen()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2033"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EltSize = LT.second.getScalarSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2034"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> M1Max = &#42;VLEN / EltSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2035"><Highlight kind="normal">      Index = Index % M1Max;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2036"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2037"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2038"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We could extract/insert the first element without vslidedown/vslideup.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2039"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Index == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2040"><Highlight kind="normal">      SlideCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2041"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::InsertElement)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2042"><Highlight kind="normal">      SlideCost = 1; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// With a constant index, we do not need to use addi.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2043"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2044"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2045"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When the vector needs to split into multiple register groups and the index</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2046"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// exceeds single vector register group, we need to insert/extract the element</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2047"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// via stack.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2048"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LT.first &gt; 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2049"><Highlight kind="normal">      ((Index == -1U) || (Index &gt;= LT.second.getVectorMinNumElements() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2050"><Highlight kind="normal">                          LT.second.isScalableVector()))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2051"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ScalarType = Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7c742b32ebcd73d6dc851afac295b0f2">getScalarType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2052"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> VecAlign = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>.getPrefTypeAlign(Val);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2053"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> SclAlign = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#aec0b8db50138e2a68aca36959b6692a5">DL</a>.getPrefTypeAlign(ScalarType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2054"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extra addi for unknown index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2055"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> IdxCost = Index == -1U ? 1 : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2056"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2057"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Store all split vectors into stack and load the target element.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2058"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opcode == Instruction::ExtractElement)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2059"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#ad360c3b9cdfb92ab7dbbcb9552d786af">getMemoryOpCost</a>(Instruction::Store, Val, VecAlign, 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2060"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#ad360c3b9cdfb92ab7dbbcb9552d786af">getMemoryOpCost</a>(Instruction::Load, ScalarType, SclAlign, 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2061"><Highlight kind="normal">                             <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2062"><Highlight kind="normal">             IdxCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2063"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2064"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Store all split vectors into stack and store the target element and load</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2065"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vectors back.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2066"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#ad360c3b9cdfb92ab7dbbcb9552d786af">getMemoryOpCost</a>(Instruction::Store, Val, VecAlign, 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>) +</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2138"><Highlight kind="normal">    CastCost += LT.first &#42; Args.size() &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2139"><Highlight kind="normal">                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvttiimpl/#a6212e41633990ea795daea7917312bdf">getCastInstrCost</a>(Instruction::FPExt, PromotedTy, LegalTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> getConstantMatCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Operand, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targettransforminfo/operandvalueinfo">TTI::OperandValueInfo</a> OpInfo) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2152"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Two sub-cases:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Assuming all other instructions have the same cost until a need arises to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// differentiate them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CastCost + ConstantMatCost +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><Highlight kind="normal">           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicttiimplbase/#ae3c3eb22dfa7c2b373ac485024f99aa6">BaseT::getArithmeticInstrCost</a>(Opcode, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>, Op1Info, Op2Info,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         Args, CxtI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlinecost-cpp/#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a> = getRISCVInstructionCost(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, LT.second, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We use BasicTTIImpl to calculate scalar costs, which assumes floating point</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ops are twice as expensive as integer ops. Do the same for vectors so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scalar floating point ops aren&#39;t cheaper than their vector equivalents.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ty-&gt;isFPOrFPVectorTy())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlinecost-cpp/#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a> &#42;= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CastCost + ConstantMatCost + LT.first &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlinecost-cpp/#abd4fe6436780bc5172e1f00bd5c3ceaf">InstrCost</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Deduplicate from TargetTransformInfoImplCRTPBase.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#ac44f6b9fdbb5f9cc199f8329cb0b272ca89f768b1267e3083b4eb05b4ab77e717">TTI::TCC&#95;Free</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the basic model we take into account GEP instructions only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (although here can come alloca instruction, a value, constants and/or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constant expressions, PHIs, bitcasts ... whatever allowed to be used as a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pointer). Typically, if Base is a not a GEP-instruction and all the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pointers are relative to the same base address, all the rest are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// either GEP instructions, PHIs, bitcasts or constants. When we have same</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// base, we just calculate cost of each non-Base GEP as an ADD operation if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// any their index is a non-const.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If no known dependecies between the pointers cost is calculated as a sum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of costs of GEP instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, V&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Ptrs)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the chain is unit-stride and BaseReg + stride&#42;i is a legal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See if the sext is the one with the right type and used in at least one</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// GetElementPtrInst.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2462"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.users()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
